# Number of Bytes

> Size (in bytes) of a [double-precision floating-point number][ieee754].

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var FLOAT64_NUM_BYTES = require( '@stdlib/constants/math/float64-num-bytes' );
```

#### FLOAT64_NUM_BYTES

Size (in bytes) of a [double-precision floating-point number][ieee754].

```javascript
var bool = ( FLOAT64_NUM_BYTES === 8 );
// returns true
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

## Examples

<!-- TODO: better example -->

```javascript
var FLOAT64_NUM_BYTES = require( '@stdlib/constants/math/float64-num-bytes' );

console.log( FLOAT64_NUM_BYTES );
// => 8
```
